content.rendered:
[vc_row cspt-bg-color=”white”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1637278567681{padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” el_class=”cspt-promo-image-box-1″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”11359″ img_size=”400*417″][vc_single_image image=”11379″ img_size=”346*400″ el_class=”cspt-promo-image-1″][vc_icon icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-play” color=”black” background_style=”rounded” background_color=”white” size=”lg” el_class=”cspt-lightbox-video” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DsIZ4C74GpVA”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]TRUE-BLUE ENERGY SERVICE LIMITED is a fully indigenous company with proven capacity for supporting clients/major projects in the Areas of Pre-Commissioning services, maintenance of production facilities, training, procurement, warehousing, lease, installation, and maintenance of OEM and non-OEM products.

We provide our customers and partners with an integrated line of products and services spanning the following:[/vc_column_text]

  • Initial needs consultation
  • Products selection
  • Procurement & installation
  • After sales maintenance
  • Manpower, and OEM product training
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Download our Brochure” style=”flat” shape=”square” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdrive.google.com%2Ffile%2Fd%2F1NX_XXbn-hTTGHp5Hkq6SAQUuziHSDSHp%2Fview%3Fusp%3Dsharing”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11781″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
  • Elevator Inspection and Certification services using the latest and advanced EMAG technology to carry out non destructive test on wire ropes
  • Inspection and Certification of heavy lifting steel wire ropes, mooring and marine ropes
  • Lifting Equipment and accessories inspection and certification services
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cspt-zindex=”2″ cspt-bg-image-position=”center-top” full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1555317734038{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://demo.creativesplanet.com/enginir/enginir-datasite/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2019/02/img-06.jpg?id=10017) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”cspt-overflow-visible”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]True-Blue has demonstrated a superlative example of local content by engineering and fabricating the first of its kind dynamic load rest facility ( Blue Mammoth) for hydraulic cylinders, winches and other hoisting systems. Our overriding commitment is providing value plus products and services, ZOLLERN being an excellent partner for driving systems and technology.

Our workshop can handle repairs, refurbishment, rebuilds annual and 5 yearly maintenance of both critical and safety accessories[/vc_column_text]

  • Hydraulic cylinder
  • Winches
  • Gearboxes
  • LoadBlocks
  • Pumps
  • AND MANY MORE
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11748″ img_size=”540×570″ el_class=”cspt-effect-dot2″ css=”.vc_custom_1645097118390{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1553337308100{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cspt-bg-color=”blackish” full_width=”stretch_row” cspt-responsive-css=”25361717|colbreak_no|||||||||colbreak_no|||||||||colbreak_no|||||||90|||colbreak_no|||||||||”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cspt-bg-color=”light” full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1553690002320{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]

HSE is a fundamental tool in our company’s operations and culture, and it is also a pre-requisite in achieving our set business objectives.[/vc_column_text][vc_progress_bar values=”%5B%7B%22label%22%3A%22HEALTH%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2295%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22SAFETY%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2290%22%7D%2C%7B%22label%22%3A%22ENVIRONMENT%22%2C%22value%22%3A%2285%22%7D%5D” units=”%” css=”.vc_custom_1637256081848{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”See our policy statement” style=”flat” shape=”square” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdrive.google.com%2Ffile%2Fd%2F1sTsRPIx7jz5ZAkw4uKrvTpj_Aq4O-Xtp%2Fview%3Fusp%3Dsharing”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11701″ img_size=”584*595″ css=”.vc_custom_1642072356093{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1553337308100{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row cspt-bg-color=”light” full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1637256035749{margin-top: -20px !important;border-top-width: -20px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]
